snippet: Georgia has fined assistant coach Shane Beamer $25,000 for accepting leaked game plan information two years ago while at Virginia Tech from a former Wake Forest assistant coach....
lead_paragraph: Georgia has fined assistant coach Shane Beamer $25,000 for accepting leaked game plan information two years ago while at Virginia Tech from a former Wake Forest assistant coach.

headline.main: Georgia Fines Shane Beamer $25K for Role in Wake Scandal
headline.print_headline: Georgia Fines Shane Beamer $25K for Role in Wake Scandal
